feed.title: Your awesome title
feed.subtitle: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

entry.title: Test Post!
entry.content:
Here’s my test post, if it works it should only display this sentence. But in theory I should be able to type as much as I want into this box before it ‘cuts’ it off…

Even a new paragraph!

But, not this one. And definitely, not this one.
entry.summary: Here’s my test post, if it works it should only display this sentence. But in theory I should be able to type as much as I want into this box before it ‘cuts’ it off… Even a new paragraph!
